description: A base set of C# for Markup helpers that can be shared between all compatible Themes from Uno.Themes
releaseNotes:
#  (2023-08-30)


### Bug Fixes

* Add Mobile Samples Heads (post update to Uno 5.X and net7.0 bump) ([#1046](https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Themes/issues/1046)) ([59e0371](https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Themes/commit/59e03714a78fb2aebc8becbc9a75d1d3c4dd2680))

* **checkbox:** the checkbox will have the same color as figma ([4a0f696](https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Themes/commit/4a0f696fbae98d80799866fc4ee95a2a93ccf70c))
* disabled text visibility ([8dc5929](https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Themes/commit/8dc59295aa69e1ec3e6feef52ed97c75f15bedbb))

* foreground of ContentPresenter is templatebounded and changing the brush of Foreground ([#1035](https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Themes/issues/1035)) ([c3e6273](https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Themes/commit/c3e62735037be9ed7d2b74376663eeb0a2c32f27))
* missing button styles ([#1034](https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Themes/issues/1034)) ([d3f8876](https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.Themes/commit/d3f8876904be24e8d7fcd2560686ba6e906b7d73))
